page.title: 07SCHOOL
page.content:
The school was built in 1873 and is situated in the middle of the village. On February 3rd,1942, a fire broke out in the school and destroyed the main room in the building. The building was reconstructed,and then, in 1978, a major rebuilding programme took place, enlarging the school and providing it with a modern hall and a new infant teaching area. The older part of the school was refurbished, and this has provided the village with an extremely well-equipped school with its own playing field and playground.
At present, the school is a primary school and children from 5 years to 11 years are taught by two teachers with some part-time help. There are 46 children at the school at present, and these numbers are likely to remain fairly stable for the next few years.
